languages.text: Суровые расправы, творимые слугами Лорд-капитана в ходе борьбы с подпольем, серьезно сократили население Януса и уменьшили его ценность как колонии.

traits.locale_text: Суровый акт децимации, которому Лорд-капитан подвергл{mf||а} Янус, серьезно сократил население планеты и приуменьшил ее ценность как колонии.

languages.text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.
languages.original_text: Суровые расправы, творимые слугами Лорд-капитана в ходе борьбы с подпольем, серьезно сократили население Януса и уменьшили его ценность как колонии.

traits.locale_text: The harsh act of decimation to which the planet was subjected on the Lord Captain's orders considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.
The harsh act of decimation to which the planet was subjected on the Lord Captain's orders considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.
The harsh act of decimation to which the planet was subjected on the Lord Captain's orders considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.
The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.
The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

languages.text: 反乱兵との戦いの最中、ロード・キャプテンの従臣は水面下で容赦無い実力行使に出た。結果、惑星ヤヌスの人口は大きく減少し、コロニーとしての価値が損われた。
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: 反乱兵との戦いの最中、ロード・キャプテンの従臣は水面下で容赦無い実力行使に出た。結果、惑星ヤヌスの人口は大きく減少し、コロニーとしての価値が損われた。

languages.text: 在与叛军的斗争过程中，舰长大人的仆从们实施了严厉的报复行动，导致加努斯人口锐减，加努斯殖民地本身的价值也遭到了损害。
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: 在与叛军的斗争过程中，舰长大人的仆从们实施了严厉的报复行动，导致加努斯人口锐减，加努斯殖民地本身的价值也遭到了损害。

languages.text: Las duras represalias que tomaron los sirvientes {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} en la lucha contra los rebeldes diezmaron la población de Janus y mermaron su valor como colonia.
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: Las duras represalias que tomaron los sirvientes {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} en la lucha contra los rebeldes diezmaron la población de Janus y mermaron su valor como colonia.

languages.text: Die harten Maßnahmen der Diener des Lord Captain im Kampf gegen den Rebellenuntergrund reduzierten die Population von Janus erheblich und verminderten seinen Wert als Kolonie.
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: Die harten Maßnahmen der Diener des Lord Captain im Kampf gegen den Rebellenuntergrund reduzierten die Population von Janus erheblich und verminderten seinen Wert als Kolonie.

languages.text: Les violentes représailles menées par les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} pour lutter contre le réseau clandestin des rebelles réduisirent considérablement la population de Janus et sa valeur en tant que colonie.
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: Les violentes représailles menées par les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} pour lutter contre le réseau clandestin des rebelles réduisirent considérablement la population de Janus et sa valeur en tant que colonie.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârlarının isyancı örgütlerle mücadelede gösterdiği tahripkâr eylemler yüzünden Janus nüfusu önemli derecede azaldı ve koloni değer kaybetti.
languages.original_text: The harsh reprisals carried out by the Lord Captain's servants in the struggle against the rebel underground considerably reduced the population of Janus and diminished its value as a colony.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârlarının isyancı örgütlerle mücadelede gösterdiği tahripkâr eylemler yüzünden Janus nüfusu önemli derecede azaldı ve koloni değer kaybetti.
